infrastructure.title: Optimize Docker Images for Production Services
infrastructure.description: Refactor Dockerfiles to use multi-stage builds and lighter base images (e.g., alpine or slim variants) to reduce image size and improve deployment speed.
infrastructure.rationale: Current Docker images are large, leading to slow CI/CD pipelines and high storage costs. Smaller images also reduce the surface area for security vulnerabilities.

infrastructure.title: Implement Centralized Logging with Loki
infrastructure.description: Configure all services to send structured logs to a centralized Loki instance for easier debugging and monitoring across the monorepo.
infrastructure.rationale: Currently, logs are scattered across individual services and Docker containers. Centralized logging is essential for troubleshooting issues in a distributed microservices architecture.
